Only a hackers paradise at lower to mid elo. 4 stacks will kick u. Prime is not worth as you still get hackers, so just gain levels instead of buying prime. Overall gameplay is good but other than the game itself its just not well maintained.

This game was great when it was still a paid game. Now that its free which means its easier to play even with a fake (non-main) account. That then leads to smurfing and or using accounts to hack which is ok for players to get banned since that's not their main accounts.
